description: Electronic Birth Certificate abnormal conditions of the newborn.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ABN_COND_NEWBORN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The abnormal conditions of the newborn category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Assisted ventilation required immediately following delivery


Assisted ventilation required for more than six hours


NICU admission


Newborn given surfactant replacement


Antibiotics received by the newborn for suspected neonatal sepsis


Seizure or serious neurologic dysfunction


Significant birth injury


None
